value.title: The worst players are always the ANGRIEST | Salt Mines #25 - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: Hope everyone has a Happy New Year, unlike some of the players in Salt Mines! This is the final episode for 2022. value.title: StarCraft 2: FLORENCIO'S 200 IQ CANNON RUSH!
